column5: Price for leeches in Kakabeca Falls $50 lb Canadian at Larryâ€™s Baits. In past years got Fair Conversion. Gave $100 us for 2 lb and got$13 Canadian back. You do the math. We should have converted this year at border. Fishing has been fantastic at Sturgon lake, north end. Big females still on spawning beds and males are hungry, next few days females should be moving back to main lake. Weather here has been cold but perfect.
